45 namespace moveit_cpp

47 constexpr char LOGNAME[] = "planning_component";
48 
49 PlanningComponent::PlanningComponent(const std::string& group_name, const MoveItCppPtr& moveit_cpp)
50  : nh_(moveit_cpp->getNodeHandle()), moveit_cpp_(moveit_cpp), group_name_(group_name)
51 {
52  joint_model_group_ = moveit_cpp_->getRobotModel()->getJointModelGroup(group_name);
53  if (!joint_model_group_)
54  {
55  std::string error = "Could not find joint model group '" + group_name + "'.";
56  ROS_FATAL_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, error);
57  throw std::runtime_error(error);
58  }
59  planning_pipeline_names_ = moveit_cpp_->getPlanningPipelineNames(group_name);
60  plan_request_parameters_.load(nh_);
61  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(
62  LOGNAME, "Plan request parameters loaded with --"
63  << " planning_pipeline: " << plan_request_parameters_.planning_pipeline << ","
64  << " planner_id: " << plan_request_parameters_.planner_id << ","
65  << " planning_time: " << plan_request_parameters_.planning_time << ","
66  << " planning_attempts: " << plan_request_parameters_.planning_attempts << ","
67  << " max_velocity_scaling_factor: " << plan_request_parameters_.max_velocity_scaling_factor << ","
68  << " max_acceleration_scaling_factor: " << plan_request_parameters_.max_acceleration_scaling_factor);
69 }
70 
71 PlanningComponent::PlanningComponent(const std::string& group_name, const ros::NodeHandle& nh)
72  : PlanningComponent(group_name, std::make_shared<MoveItCpp>(nh))
73 {
74 }
75 
76 PlanningComponent::~PlanningComponent()
77 {
78  ROS_INFO_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Deleting PlanningComponent '%s'", group_name_.c_str());
79  clearContents();
80 }
81 
82 const std::vector<std::string> PlanningComponent::getNamedTargetStates()
83 {
84  if (joint_model_group_)
85  {
86  return joint_model_group_->getDefaultStateNames();
87  }
88  else
89  {
90  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unable to find joint group with name '%s'.", group_name_.c_str());
91  }
92 
93  std::vector<std::string> empty;
94  return empty;
95 }
96 
97 const std::string& PlanningComponent::getPlanningGroupName() const
98 {
99  return group_name_;
100 }
101 
102 PlanningComponent::PlanSolution PlanningComponent::plan(const PlanRequestParameters& parameters)
103 {
104  last_plan_solution_ = std::make_shared<PlanSolution>();
105  if (!joint_model_group_)
106  {
107  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to retrieve joint model group for name '%s'.", group_name_.c_str());
108  last_plan_solution_->error_code = MoveItErrorCode(moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GROUP_NAME);
109  return *last_plan_solution_;
110  }
111 
112  // Clone current planning scene
113  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr planning_scene_monitor =
114  moveit_cpp_->getPlanningSceneMonitorNonConst();
115  planning_scene_monitor->updateFrameTransforms();
116  planning_scene_monitor->lockSceneRead(); // LOCK planning scene
117  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr planning_scene =
118  planning_scene::PlanningScene::clone(planning_scene_monitor->getPlanningScene());
119  planning_scene_monitor->unlockSceneRead(); // UNLOCK planning scene
120  planning_scene_monitor.reset(); // release this pointer
121 
122  // Init MotionPlanRequest
123  ::planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest req;
124  req.group_name = group_name_;
125  req.planner_id = parameters.planner_id;
126  req.num_planning_attempts = std::max(1, parameters.planning_attempts);
127  req.allowed_planning_time = parameters.planning_time;
128  req.max_velocity_scaling_factor = parameters.max_velocity_scaling_factor;
129  req.max_acceleration_scaling_factor = parameters.max_acceleration_scaling_factor;
130  if (workspace_parameters_set_)
131  req.workspace_parameters = workspace_parameters_;
132 
133  // Set start state
134  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr start_state = considered_start_state_;
135  if (!start_state)
136  start_state = moveit_cpp_->getCurrentState();
137  start_state->update();
138  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(*start_state, req.start_state);
139  planning_scene->setCurrentState(*start_state);
140 
141  // Set goal constraints
142  if (current_goal_constraints_.empty())
143  {
144  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No goal constraints set for planning request");
145  last_plan_solution_->error_code = MoveItErrorCode(moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GOAL_CONSTRAINTS);
146  return *last_plan_solution_;
147  }
148  req.goal_constraints = current_goal_constraints_;
149 
150  // Run planning attempt
151  ::planning_interface::MotionPlanResponse res;
152  if (planning_pipeline_names_.find(parameters.planning_pipeline) == planning_pipeline_names_.end())
153  {
154  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No planning pipeline available for name '%s'", parameters.planning_pipeline.c_str());
155  last_plan_solution_->error_code = MoveItErrorCode(moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE);
156  return *last_plan_solution_;
157  }
158  const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr pipeline =
159  moveit_cpp_->getPlanningPipelines().at(parameters.planning_pipeline);
160  pipeline->generatePlan(planning_scene, req, res);
161  last_plan_solution_->error_code = res.error_code_.val;
162  if (res.error_code_.val != res.error_code_.SUCCESS)
163  {
164  ROS_ERROR("Could not compute plan successfully");
165  return *last_plan_solution_;
166  }
167  last_plan_solution_->start_state = req.start_state;
168  last_plan_solution_->trajectory = res.trajectory_;
169  // TODO(henningkayser): Visualize trajectory
170  // std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*> eef_links;
171  // if (joint_model_group->getEndEffectorTips(eef_links))
172  //{
173  // for (const auto& eef_link : eef_links)
174  // {
175  // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing trajectory for end effector " << eef_link->getName());
176  // visual_tools_->publishTrajectoryLine(last_solution_trajectory_, eef_link);
177  // visual_tools_->publishTrajectoryPath(last_solution_trajectory_, false);
178  // visual_tools_->publishRobotState(last_solution_trajectory_->getLastWayPoint(), rviz_visual_tools::TRANSLUCENT);
179  // }
180  //}
181  return *last_plan_solution_;
182 }
183 
184 PlanningComponent::PlanSolution PlanningComponent::plan()
185 {
186  return plan(plan_request_parameters_);
187 }
188 
189 bool PlanningComponent::setStartState(const moveit::core::RobotState& start_state)
190 {
191  considered_start_state_ = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(start_state);
192  return true;
193 }
194 
195 moveit::core::RobotStatePtr PlanningComponent::getStartState()
196 {
197  if (considered_start_state_)
198  return considered_start_state_;
199  else
200  {
201  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr s;
202  moveit_cpp_->getCurrentState(s, 1.0);
203  return s;
204  }
205 }
206 
207 bool PlanningComponent::setStartState(const std::string& start_state_name)
208 {
209  const auto& named_targets = getNamedTargetStates();
210  if (std::find(named_targets.begin(), named_targets.end(), start_state_name) == named_targets.end())
211  {
212  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No predefined joint state found for target name '%s'", start_state_name.c_str());
213  return false;
214  }
215  moveit::core::RobotState start_state(moveit_cpp_->getRobotModel());
216  start_state.setToDefaultValues(joint_model_group_, start_state_name);
217  return setStartState(start_state);
218 }
219 
220 void PlanningComponent::setStartStateToCurrentState()
221 {
222  considered_start_state_.reset();
223 }
224 
225 std::map<std::string, double> PlanningComponent::getNamedTargetStateValues(const std::string& name)
226 {
227  // TODO(henningkayser): verify result
228  std::map<std::string, double> positions;
229  joint_model_group_->getVariableDefaultPositions(name, positions);
230  return positions;
231 }
232 
233 void PlanningComponent::setWorkspace(double minx, double miny, double minz, double maxx, double maxy, double maxz)
234 {
235  workspace_parameters_.header.frame_id = moveit_cpp_->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame();
236  workspace_parameters_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
237  workspace_parameters_.min_corner.x = minx;
238  workspace_parameters_.min_corner.y = miny;
239  workspace_parameters_.min_corner.z = minz;
240  workspace_parameters_.max_corner.x = maxx;
241  workspace_parameters_.max_corner.y = maxy;
242  workspace_parameters_.max_corner.z = maxz;
243  workspace_parameters_set_ = true;
244 }
245 
246 void PlanningComponent::unsetWorkspace()
247 {
248  workspace_parameters_set_ = false;
249 }
250 
251 bool PlanningComponent::setGoal(const std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints>& goal_constraints)
252 {
253  current_goal_constraints_ = goal_constraints;
254  return true;
255 }
256 
257 bool PlanningComponent::setGoal(const moveit::core::RobotState& goal_state)
258 {
259  current_goal_constraints_ = { kinematic_constraints::constructGoalConstraints(goal_state, joint_model_group_) };
260  return true;
261 }
262 
263 bool PlanningComponent::setGoal(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goal_pose, const std::string& link_name)
264 {
265  current_goal_constraints_ = { kinematic_constraints::constructGoalConstraints(link_name, goal_pose) };
266  return true;
267 }
268 
269 bool PlanningComponent::setGoal(const std::string& goal_state_name)
270 {
271  const auto& named_targets = getNamedTargetStates();
272  if (std::find(named_targets.begin(), named_targets.end(), goal_state_name) == named_targets.end())
273  {
274  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No predefined joint state found for target name '%s'", goal_state_name.c_str());
275  return false;
276  }
277  moveit::core::RobotState goal_state(moveit_cpp_->getRobotModel());
278  goal_state.setToDefaultValues(joint_model_group_, goal_state_name);
279  return setGoal(goal_state);
280 }
281 
282 bool PlanningComponent::execute(bool blocking)
283 {
284  if (!last_plan_solution_)
285  {
286  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "There is no successfull plan to execute");
287  return false;
288  }
289 
290  // TODO(henningkayser): parameterize timestamps if required
291  // trajectory_processing::TimeOptimalTrajectoryGeneration totg;
292  // if (!totg.computeTimeStamps(*last_solution_trajectory_, max_velocity_scaling_factor_,
293  // max_acceleration_scaling_factor_))
294  //{
295  // ROS_ERROR("Failed to parameterize trajectory");
296  // return false;
297  //}
298  return moveit_cpp_->execute(group_name_, last_plan_solution_->trajectory, blocking);
299 }
300 
301 const PlanningComponent::PlanSolutionPtr PlanningComponent::getLastPlanSolution()
302 {
303  return last_plan_solution_;
304 }
305 
306 void PlanningComponent::clearContents()
307 {
308  considered_start_state_.reset();
309  last_plan_solution_.reset();
310  current_goal_constraints_.clear();
311  moveit_cpp_.reset();
312  planning_pipeline_names_.clear();
313 }
